IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: HEIGHTEN AWARENESS AND EXPAND COUNTRY MUSIC, HONOR EXCELLENCE. AND SERVE AS A PROFESSIONAL RESOURCE FOR THE INDUSTRY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: 1. HEIGHTEN AWARENESS AND GROW THE BUSINESS OF COUNTRY MUSIC.2. SERVE AS THE INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION CENTER FOR INDUSTRY AND CONSUMER TRENDS.3. PROVIDE A FORUM FOR INDUSTRY LEADERSHIP TO ADVANCE COUNTRY MUSIC.4. RECOGNIZE EXCELLENCE IN THE INDUSTRY.5. DEVELOP ONGOING INDUSTRY AND CONSUMER RESEARCH WITH THE GOAL OF IMPROVING COMMUNICATION AND EDUCATION WITH COUNTRY MUSIC STAKEHOLDERS.
IRS990.Desc: THE ASSOCIATION PRODUCES THE ANNUAL CMA AWARDS, AN INDUSTRY VOTED EVENT, CELEBRATING THE ACHIEVEMENTS OF OUR CREATIVE COMMUNITY WHILE SHOWCASING THEIR TALENTS TO A GLOBAL AUDIENCE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CMA FEST IS AN ANNUAL FOUR-DAY MUSIC FESTIVAL THAT HOSTS TENS OF THOUSANDS OF FANS PROVIDING THEM THE OPPORTUNITY TO LISTEN AND DISCOVER HUNDREDS OF COUNTRY MUSIC ACTS WHILE RAISING MONEY FOR THE CMA FOUNDATION.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: THE ASSOCIATION PROVIDES ITS MEMBERS ACCESS TO BENEFITS INCLUDING, PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT, HEALTH CARE RESOURCES, INDUSTRY VOTING PRIVILEGES, NETWORKING OPPORTUNITIES, RESEARCH, ETC.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.TitleTxt: EXEC DR., CMA FOUNDATION & VP COMMUNITY OUTREACH

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ASSOCIATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF INTERNAL REVENUE CODE SECTION 501(C)(6), AND, ACCORDINGLY, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IS INCLUDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, EXCEPT FOR AMOUNTS REPRESENTING UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAX. THE ASSOCIATION IS ALSO SUBJECT TO TENNESSEE FRANCHISE TAX AND A 6.5% EXCISE TAX ON UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME. THE ASSOCIATION RECOGNIZES THE TAX BENEFIT ASSOCIATED WITH A TAX POSITION TAKEN FOR TAX RETURN PURPOSES WHEN IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THE POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED. THE ASSOCIATION DOES NOT BELIEVE THERE ARE ANY MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFY FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. IT IS THE ASSOCIATION'S POLICY TO RECOGNIZE INTEREST AND/OR PENALTIES RELATED TO INCOME TAX MATTERS IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE. AS OF MARCH 31, 2023, THE ASSOCIATION HAS ACCRUED NO INTEREST AND NO PENALTIES RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. THE ASSOCIATION IS GENERALLY SUBJECT TO U.S. FEDERAL AND TENNESSEE TAX EXAMINATION FOR THREE YEARS FROM THE DATE THE RETURN WAS FILED.
STANDARD BOOKKEEPING PROCEDURES CONSISTENT WITH U.S. OPERATIONS.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: SUPPORTING MUSIC EDUCATIONAL AND CULTURAL ACTIVITIES

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CMA PROVIDES FUNDING TO PROFESSIONAL ORGANIZATIONS COMMITTED TO SUPPORTING THE GROWTH OF COUNTRY MUSIC, HONORING ITS LEGACY, DEVELOPING INDUSTRY PERSONNEL AND/OR PROVIDING NECESSARY RESOURCES TO PRIORITIZE THE HEALTH OF ITS MEMBERS. ORGANIZATIONS RECEIVING FUNDING PROVIDE AN OVERVIEW, COMPLETE WITH A BUDGET AND EXECUTION PLAN. EACH PLAN IS CAREFULLY MONITORED AND REVIEWED ANNUALLY FOR SUCCESS AND COMPLETION.

RltdOrgOfficerTrstKeyEmplGrp.TitleTxt: EXEC DR., CMA FOUNDATION & VP COMMUN

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: MS. BERTELLI'S EMPLOYER, REACH, RECEIVED GRANTS AND OTHER AMOUNTS OF CONTRIBUTIONS FROM THE COUNTRY MUSIC ASSOCIATION, INC.
MR. YOUNG'S EMPLOYER, COUNTRY MUSIC HALL OF FAME , RECEIVED GRANTS AND OTHER AMOUNTS OF CONTRIBUTIONS FROM THE COUNTRY MUSIC ASSOCIATION, INC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERS OF THE VOLUNTARY BOARD ARE FROM ALL AREAS OF THE MUSIC INDUSTRY. OFTEN, COMPETITORS WILL SERVE DURING THE SAME TERM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CMA IS A TRADE ASSOCIATION THAT PROMOTES COUNTRY MUSIC. SEVERAL MEMBERSHIP TIERS ARE OFFERED TO ENSURE ALL PROFESSIONALS AT DIFFERENT STAGES IN THEIR CAREER CAN PARTICIPATE THROUGH MEMBERSHIP. CMA MEMBERS RECEIVE A VARIETY OF MEMBER BENEFITS INCLUDING, PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT, HEALTH CARE RESOURCES, INDUSTRY VOTING PRIVILEGES, NETWORKING OPPORTUNITIES, RESEARCH, ETC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROFESSIONAL VOTING MEMBERS HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO VOTE FOR THE CMA AWARDS AND FOR THE ELECTED BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CHANGES TO BY-LAWS ARE E-MAILED TO ALL INDIVIDUAL MEMBERS. CHANGES ARE DETERMINED BY THE CMA BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS POSTED TO THE BOARD WEBSITE FOR ALL BOARD MEMBERS TO REVIEW AND A REVIEW SESSION OPEN TO ALL BOARD MEMBERS IS HELD BEFORE IT IS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A QUARTERLY BOARD REPORT IS PREPARED DETAILING PAYMENTS MADE TO BOARD MEMBERS OR THEIR COMPANIES. THIS REPORT IS REVIEWED BY THE SR. VICE PRESIDENT OF FINANCE AND ADMINISTRATION. AT THE END OF THE YEAR, THE COMPLETE REPORT IS REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND SR. VICE PRESIDENT OF FINANCE AND ADMINISTRATION. THIS REPORT IS PROVIDED TO THE FINANCE AND AUDIT COMMITTEE QUARTERLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PERSONNEL COMMITTEE WHICH IS COMPRISED OF MEMBERS OF THE BOARD DETERMINES THE CEO'S COMPENSATION. TYPICALLY, THIS COMMITTEE WORKS WITH AN EXTERNAL HUMAN RESOURCES CONSULTING GROUP TO OBTAIN INFORMATION REGARDING COMPENSATION FOR CEOS IN SIMILAR SIZE ORGANIZATIONS. THE CEO ALSO UTILIZES EXTERNAL HUMAN RESOURCES CONSULTING GROUP TO VALIDATE SALARY RANGES FOR KEY EMPLOYEES. THE CEO RECOMMENDS COMPENSATION FOR KEY EMPLOYEES AND IT IS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY PERSONNEL COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST ONLY.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PREVIOUS YEAR.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: PROVIDE SUPPORT TO COUNTRY MUSIC ASSOCIATION & THE COUNTRY MUSIC COMMUNITY
